description: This file defines API routes for progress tracking in a training platform, using FastAPI to create endpoints that manage user progress, mark lessons as complete, and retrieve progress details.

methods.name: UserProgressResponse get_user_progress(user_id: str, progress_repo: ProgressRepoDep, skill_repo: SkillRepoDep)
methods.description: Retrieves aggregated progress entries for a specified user.

methods.name: ProgressEntryResponse mark_lesson_complete( req: MarkCompleteRequest, progress_repo: ProgressRepoDep, skill_repo: SkillRepoDep )
methods.description: Marks a specific lesson as completed for a user, optionally recording a score.

methods.name: get_progress_for_lesson( user_id: str, lesson_id: str, progress_repo: ProgressRepoDep, skill_repo: SkillRepoDep )
methods.description: Fetches all progress entries for a specific user and lesson.

ctags.name: get_progress_for_lesson
ctags.signature: ( user_id: str, lesson_id: str, progress_repo: ProgressRepoDep, skill_repo: SkillRepoDep )

ctags.name: get_user_progress
ctags.pattern: /^def get_user_progress(user_id: str, progress_repo: ProgressRepoDep, skill_repo: SkillRepoDep) ->/

ctags.name: mark_lesson_complete
ctags.signature: ( req: MarkCompleteRequest, progress_repo: ProgressRepoDep, skill_repo: SkillRepoDep )
